description: React component for creating and submitting a quiz with multiple-choice questions, including form handling, state management, and database interactions via Supabase.

methods.name: addQuestion
methods.description: Adds a new question to the questions list.

methods.name: updateOpt
methods.description: Updates a specific option of a question.

methods.name: submit
methods.description: Handles form submission to create a quiz and its questions in the database.
